Package phylo3D.utilities

This package contains various utility functionality: file operations, debug methods and constants.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Constants Class holding constant values
Debug Class used for sending textual output relating to testing and debugging, not output that is for the end user
FileOperations Class implementing functionality for reading and writing to files
TextOutput Class implementing textual output functionality.
UserInfo Class used for handling textual output destined for the program's end used.
 

Exception Summary
CommandLineException Superclass for all command line related exceptions
CommandLineInputsException Command line exceptions due to errors in the inputs supplied e.g. supplying an option value that is a String instead of an Integer
CommandLineParsingException Command line exceptions due to errors in the parsing of the command line
FatalException Superclass for all exceptions that are considered to be fatal to the running of the program.
InputFileAccessException Input file access exceptions due to the inability to access an input file whether it be user supplied or not.
InvalidInputsException Invalid inputs exception due to errors in the inputs to the program that can occur at another level than at the command line
MiscellaneousFatalException Fatal Exception that does not fit into any of the other classes
ObjectIntrospectionException Exception that covers the case where the program is not able to introspect an object.
OutputFileAccessException Exception to be thrown when the program is unable to access an output file for writing to.
ProgramInputFileAccessException Exception covering the special case where the access problem relaties to an input file that is part of the program, as opposed to supplied by the user.
ProgramInputFileParsingException Exception due to an error in the parsing of an input file that is part of the program.
UserInputFileAccessException Special case of the input file access exception where the input file is supplied by the user.
UserInputFileParsingException Exception thrown if an error occurs in the parsing of a user supplied file
 

Package phylo3D.utilities Description

This package contains various utility functionality: file operations, debug methods and constants.
